description: JOQUER-ISHLY, the best WhatsApp Bot ever made

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your JOQUER-ISHLY session id here; ~ (Yes, it's like a secret agent code. Don’t mess it up!)

BOT_NAME.description: Enter your bot name here (JOQUER-ISHLY is cool, but feel free to name it something quirky! for its your bot also)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your number here, starting with country code (e.g., 2557xxxxxxx, because even bots need to know how to reach you!)

OWNER_NAME.description: Enter your name here (Who’s the boss behind the scenes? Spoiler: It's you!)

TIMEZONE.description: Enter your timezone here. Google it or just leave it if you don't know! (The bot won’t mind, but you should be in sync with time zones!)
